about_the_game:
In a dark and gothic universe, 8 witches with different abilities are masters of hunting creatures. They encounter creatures that wage war against them in three different places. They continue to fight, exploring the spooky mansion, the desolate forest, and the stone tower. After each encounter with the creatures, they gain the right to move to a new room. There are also different options for character development while fighting.

The player can choose only one of the witches and regulates the development of the witch he chooses according to his wishes with the options available to him. He can use 5 weapons at the same time and the player has the freedom to choose to develop them. On the other hand, he encounters different creatures in each place and discovers the dark secrets of the places.

short_description: Witches' Hallow is a top-down arena game where you fight against hordes of creatures as a witch who can use up to 5 weapons. Choose one of the witches, develop her as you wish and explore 3 different spooky areas! Don't forget to stay alive while doing this!
